EmailTemplate.subject: Article: How 2020 Shook Up the Payments Industry
EmailTemplate.textOnly: From digital payments and buy now, pay later to contactless payments, the pandemic has driven consumers to look for more ways to transact safely and securely. But, according to Ernst & Young, a full 50% of FIs lag when it comes to updating their IT systems to address this surge in new payment types.
